item.description:
Join our Publicity Director, Wini and her husband John at Vincent's in Randolph, for the first of their three Halloween Party Nights!

Halloween 2007 and Vincent's will be Oct. 25th, 26th and 27th. This is one of the biggest weekends of the year. Hundreds come vying for first place for their costumes. You will see some of the most creative and sexiest dressed people on this planet. The prizes are as in the past: $1,000 for 1st prize and VIP gold 2nd prize.

Let your alter ego emerge as you party the night away...!

For more details, directions etc. seeVincent's Night Club

If you would like to meet up with Wini and John when you get to Vincent's, contact Wini for further details at publicity@hubtall.org

Note: Entrance fee at Vincent's is usually around $10, but may be different since this is a special event. Contact Vincent's directly for specific pricing info.
item.name: Halloween Party at Vincents NightClub
